1551.63.text: find non-voters and verbally insult them

1553.97.text:
with comments like, "You dress
funny, you're a slacker."

1557.21.text: Or, "I've seen better faces on clocks."

1561.28.text:
Do you like my incentives
and dis-incentives program

1565.22.text:
I'd enjoy hearing your
reactions or suggestions.

1568.57.text: It might provide a good laugh

1570.24.text: in this not so humorous election.

1576.34.text: In America we have this privilege.

1578.21.text:
Let's value it and fulfill
our duty as citizens.

1581.97.text:
We hope that our show made
you think and challenged you.

1584.98.text:
If you have thoughts and
comments about today's broadcast

1587.65.text:
or any other show you may
have watched from the website,

1590.95.text:
send them to our email
address on the screen.

1594.18.text: You can also access our past shows

1599.06.text: posted on the screen during any show

1601.25.text: you can watch it again online

1603.08.text:
by fast-forwarding to a
specific place in that show.

1606.24.text: That tip may help you out.

1608.00.text: Be sure and join us next week

1611.67.text: Until then, I'm Keith Kirkpatrick saying,

1613.78.text:
make a positive difference
in our world today.

1617.18.text:
>> Announcer: Funding
is supported by NIPSCO.

1618.80.text:
Today's young minds are
constantly re-imagining

1621.21.text: what our world will be like tomorrow.

1623.27.text:
That's why NIPSCO is upgrading
its infrastructure now.

1626.42.text: So we're ready for whatever comes next.
